mapper.insert: INSERT INTO DONATE_PRODUCT( PRODUCT_NO, PRODUCT_TYPE, PUSER_NAME, BUSINESS_NAME, PHONE, EMAIL, PRODUCT_WAY, PRODUCT_AMOUNT, RECEIPT, BUSINESS_NUM, RESIDENT_NUM, STATUS,PRODUCT_DATE, CATEGORY_NO, INQUIRY_CONTENT ) VALUES( SEQ_DOPRONO.CURRVAL, productType, puserName, businessName, phone, email, productWay, productAmount, receipt, businessNum, residentNum, 'Y', SYSDATE, categoryNo, inquiryContent )
